userSettings.saveSettingsSuccessAlert: Your Settings have been successfully saved.

optionDescriptions.exerciseCreatedOrStartedDescription: Get notified when a (new) exercise has been created or started
optionDescriptions.exerciseOpenForPracticeDescription: Get notified when an exercise has been opened for practice (e.g. Quiz)
optionDescriptions.newPostForExercisesDescription: Get notified when a new post about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.newReplyForExercisesDescription: Get notified when a new reply about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.attachmentChangesDescription: Receive a notification when an attachment was changed
optionDescriptions.newPostForLectureDescription: Get notified when a new post about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.newReplyForLectureDescription: Get notified when a new reply about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.courseAndExamArchivingStartedDescription: Receive a notification when the process of archiving a course or exam has been started
